addr: 1001 Rose Bowl Drive, Lot K Pasadena, CA 91103
title: Tofurky Trot 2015 Rose Bowl
desc: We will have lots and lots of shirts this year, but best to come early to be guaranteed your preferred T-shirt size. Or better yet, go to packet pickup on Wednesday at the New Balance Pasadena Store to get your shirt and bib. ? Shirts given to day of registrees first come, first served. (Sorry but we won't have shirts available for the children under 6 who are registered for free.) No, we will have your name on our master roster sheet. ?But it might be good to have the ticket just in case. Sorry no refunds. ?Thanks for your donation!
